verses.roman:
sarvatra pramāṇa dibe purāṇa-vacana
śrī-mūrti-viṣṇu-mandira karaṇa-lakṣaṇa

synonyms: sarvatra—everywhere; pramāṇa—evidence; dibe—you should give; purāṇa-vacana—quoting from the Purāṇas; śrī-mūrti—the Deity; viṣṇu-mandira—of the Viṣṇu temple; karaṇa-lakṣaṇa—the characteristics of constructing.
translation: "Whatever you say about Vaiṣṇava behavior, the establishment of Vaiṣṇava temples and Deities and everything else should be supported by evidence from the Purāṇas.
